duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee the receiving and distribution of goods.
Ensure orders received are accurately and efficiently completed.
Perform quality assurance checks on all products received before stocking or distributing goods.
Maintain proper levels of stock in the warehouse to ensure maximum profitability.
Conduct routine and periodic inventory counts on the warehouse.
Ensure the receiving area is following proper 5S and maintaining a safe environment.
Maintain the warehouse in an efficient, neat, and safe manner.
Responsible for the maintenance and upkeep of the warehouse.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience and extensive knowledge of purchasing policies and practices. Master’s degree preferred.
